summary.text:
**Crafting proofs and summaries**

I need to make sure the citations and research notes are concise, ideally under 200 words. I’ll count the approximate words to ensure it fits. For the one-line summary, I want it to be clear and under 100 characters. The phrase I’m working with seems lengthy, so I'll refine it. I’m settling on: “Shared-edge clique classification proved; non-edge-sharing cliques and outerplanar case remain.” That should capture everything succinctly and meet the length requirement!

**Summarizing key highlights**

I'm listing some highlights here, aiming for clarity and conciseness. 

- If G is K4-free, the maximal cliques of the primal are facial triangles.
- The link of any interior vertex forms a chordless cycle, and if the interior degree is at least 4, T(v) becomes a maximal clique in kG.
- An interior face t with three edges induces a maximal K4 in kG.
- kG is connected if G has two or more faces.
- There's a local Helly condition regarding faces meeting incident edges.
- Proposition 13 outlines the classification with a shared interior edge present. 

I'm verifying that with seven items listed, I need to keep it to 3-7 highlights.

**Creating next questions and final summary**

I’m moving on to the next questions. I need to prove that non-edge-sharing maximal cliques share a common vertex, which follows the Helly-type condition and shows these cliques have a size of 4 or less. 

Next, I must formalize ear-removal induction for the outerplanar case to establish k-nullness. 

I’ll also enumerate small Whitney disk triangulations with an interior degree of 4-5 to explore potential counterexamples. 

The citations are in summary_md, and I must return strictly JSON formatted without any extra trailing commas. I’ll also keep my final summary under 200 words.

content.text: {"summary_md":"This round established core local structure for finite Whitney triangulations of the disk and advanced the classification of maximal cliques in kG when an interior edge is shared. Proven: G is K4-free so maximal cliques of the primal are exactly facial triangles; the link of any interior vertex is a chordless cycle, hence interior degree ≥4; for interior v the incident-face set T(v) is a maximal clique in kG; any interior face with all three edges interior yields N(t) that induces a maximal K4 in kG; kG is connected for graphs with ≥2 faces. New structural lemmas: a local Helly lemma across an interior edge, and Proposition 13 classifying any maximal clique containing two faces that share an interior edge (it is T(u), T(v), N(t) or N(g)). Verified k-nullness for fans, the two-face disk, and the hexagon-with-central-triangle. Remaining major gap: classification of maximal cliques with no edge-sharing pair and a completed outerplanar ear-removal proof. Citations: Research Notes; Rigorous Proofs; Verifier Summary.","one_line_summary":"Shared-edge clique classification proved; non-edge-sharing cliques and outerplanar proof remain.","highlights":["G is K4-free ⇒ maximal cliques of the primal are exactly facial triangles.","Link of any interior vertex is a chordless cycle ⇒ interior degree ≥4; T(v) is a maximal clique in kG.","An interior face with three interior edges produces N(t) which induces a maximal K4 in kG.","kG is connected whenever G has at least two faces.","Local Helly across an interior edge: a face meeting both incident faces must contain one endpoint.","Proposition 13: any maximal clique containing two faces sharing an interior edge equals T(u), T(v), N(t) or N(g).","Verified k-null for fans, two-triangle disk, and hexagon+central triangle."],"next_questions":["Prove that any pairwise-intersecting family of facial triangles with no two sharing an edge has a common vertex (Helly-type) to complete clique classification.","Formalize the ear-removal induction for the outerplanar (no interior vertices) case to deduce k-nullness.","Exhaustively generate small Whitney disk triangulations (interior degrees 4–5) to search for counterexamples or supporting data."]}

one_line_summary.description: Brief one-line summary for UI display
one_line_summary.title: One Line Summary
